subject: Order #SSN3566
description_text:
Hey!


Can you give me some info about my order? I put up my order in 7 days ago
and haven’t received any information about it.


Best regards

conversations.body_text: Hi Jürgen Järveküla,    We apologise for any inconvenience caused. Our German warehouse is currently out of stock, with replenishment expected by the 27th. At that time, we shall dispatch your order via DHL and refund the additional shipping charges incurred.

Okay.

And when I can expect it to be delivered based on your past experience?

And also does it mean I won’t need to pay any extra import taxes and extra
fees in Estonia because it will be shipped from Germany?


On Mon, 24. Nov 2025 at 12:46, support@simsonn.com
Hi Jürgen Järveküla,    Estimated delivery in 3-5 days. Yes, no customs duties required.

Okay.

Thank you so much!


On Mon, 24. Nov 2025 at 13:00, support@simsonn.com

Hey again!


Will you send me tracking link if the order is shipped? And also did I got
it right that you can’t send my order from your warehouse not until 27th
and from that on I can expect 3-5 days to arrive?


On Mon, 24. Nov 2025 at 13:04, Jürgen Järveküla <jurgenjarv@gmail.com>
wrote:

> Okay.
>
> Thank you so much!
>
>
> On Mon, 24. Nov 2025 at 13:00, support@simsonn.com
Hi Jürgen Järveküla,    Yes, we will update your logistics tracking link at that time. Thank you for your understanding!
